articles.title: Entertainer Rihanna snaps up Beverly Hills mansion for $17.8m - Domain News
articles.description: Rihanna has become quite the property investor over the years, owning multiple homes in the United States, Britain and Barbados.
articles.content:
Multi-talented entertainer Rihanna, who sings, dances, acts and has her own line of beauty products and lingerie, can now add Beverly Hills homeowner to her impressive list of achievements.
